responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: "Insecure data storage in memory after serialization in ImageGalleryRecorder"
    analysis: |
      ImageGalleryRecorder uses a Serializable class, which may lead to insecure data storage in memory after serialization. This could potentially allow an attacker to access or manipulate sensitive data.
    cwe: CWE-502
    function_names:
      - "ImageGalleryRecorder"
    filenames:
      - "src/main/java/org/jenkinsci/plugins/imagegallery/ImageGalleryRecorder.java"
    classification: "very promising"
```

leads.headline: Insecure data storage in memory after serialization in ImageGalleryRecorder
leads.analysis: ImageGalleryRecorder uses a Serializable class, which may lead to insecure data storage in memory after serialization. This could potentially allow an attacker to access or manipulate sensitive data.
